ocean.question: I am big and blue, and fish like to swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I'm made of water.
⛵️ Boats sail on me.
🐳 Whales live in me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and I move very slowly on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I'm not very fast.
🏠 I carry my home on my back.
🌿 I like to eat plants and algae.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🔵 I can change colors.
⚫️ I squirt ink when I'm scared.
🖐️ I have many arms.

ocean.question: I'm a big fish with sharp teeth. Some people are scared of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I swim in the ocean.
🦷 I have lots of teeth.
🎬 You might see me in a scary movie.

ocean.question: I'm pink and live in the ocean, and have many arms. What am I?

hints.text: ⭐ I look like a star.
🖐️ I have five arms or more.
🏖️ You can sometimes find me on the beach.

ocean.question: I'm a mammal that lives in the ocean and I'm known for being smart and friendly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐬 I make clicking sounds.
⚽ I like to play with a ball.
🙂 I'm always smiling.

ocean.question: I am very large and live in the ocean, but I'm not a fish. I breathe air through a blowhole. What am I?

hints.text: 🌬️ I spout water into the air.
🎶 I sing songs underwater.
🐳 I'm the biggest animal on Earth!

ocean.question: I'm a sea creature with a long body and a stinger. Be careful, I can shock you! What am I?

hints.text: ⚡️I use my stinger for defense.
🐍 I can shock you with my body.
🩱 Swimmers need to be careful around me.

ocean.question: I live in the sea. I look like a plant, but I am an animal. Clownfish love to hide in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 Clownfish make their home in me
💐 I sway back and forth in the water.
🐟 I help clean the water for the fish.

ocean.question: I’m a big sea creature. I'm flat and swim with large fins that look like wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🕊️ I look like I'm flying underwater.
🌊 I live in warm oceans.
🍽️ I like to eat small fish and shrimp.

cosmos.question: I am big and bright and come out at night. I twinkle in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am very far away.
🌌 You can see many of me in the night.
🌠 I am not the moon.

cosmos.question: I am round and you live on me. I have land and water. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I am your home.
🌎 I spin around and around.
🌱 Plants and animals live here with you.

cosmos.question: I am very hot and give light to the Earth. You can only look at me with special glasses. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot!
🌞 I come out during the day.
😎 Without me, the Earth would be cold and dark.

cosmos.question: I am round and I go around the Earth. Sometimes I am full and bright, sometimes you can barely see me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 I shine at night, but I don't have my own light.
🌙 I change my shape every night.
🚀 Astronauts have walked on me.

cosmos.question: I am a big group of stars. Some look like animals or people. What am I?

hints.text: 🔗 I am a pattern of stars.
🐻 Some are named after animals.
🔭 You need a telescope to see them clearly.

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of gas, like a big hot air balloon, but much bigger. I am very far away. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I am made of stuff that's not solid or liquid.
🔆 The Sun is one of me!
🌌 I'm found all over the universe.

cosmos.question: I am a big, round space rock that goes around the Sun. Earth is one of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 I'm bigger than a moon, but smaller than a sun.
👨‍🚀 Some have rings around them.
🚶 Some have people living on them.

cosmos.question: I am a group of many stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. Our sun is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 I'm very big and have lots of stars inside.
🌌 The Milky Way is an example of me.
✨ Some are shaped like spirals.

cosmos.question: I am a bright streak of light in the night sky. I am a small piece of space rock burning up in the air. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I zoom through the sky really fast.
🌠 People sometimes call me a 'falling star'.
🔥 I get very hot when I enter the Earth's atmosphere.

cosmos.question: I am a place in space where gravity is so strong that not even light can escape. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I am invisible because light cannot escape from me
🕳️ I suck everything in!
🌌 I can be formed when a big star dies.
